entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
